last_episode_to_air.name: Passage
last_episode_to_air.overview: While Sumire continues to shine, Tsurukoma reconsiders her future. Kiyo prepares her most important meal yet.

name: The Makanai: Cooking for the Maiko House
original_name: 舞妓さんちのまかないさん
overview: Two inseparable friends move to Kyoto to chase their dreams of becoming maiko, but decide to pursue different passions while living under the same roof.

episodes.name: Change
episodes.overview: Kiyo and Sumire leave their hometown and head to Kyoto, where they will train as apprentice maiko entertainers.

episodes.name: Guardian Spirit
episodes.overview: Kiyo receives some unfortunate news, but quickly finds her true calling when the maiko sisters get tired of ordering takeout.

episodes.name: Taboo
episodes.overview: A former maiko suddenly makes a return. To her delight, Kiyo receives a heavy package from home.

episodes.name: Wish
episodes.overview: Kiyo and Sumire get a day off and explore the city, making a wish at the shrine. An unexpected guest visits the maiko house, much to Sumire's dismay.

episodes.name: Choice
episodes.overview: Love is in the air — except for Kiyo, who only has eyes for food. Sumire receives wonderful news, while Ryoko battles with her feelings.

episodes.name: One-sided
episodes.overview: Kiyo sets her eyes on the top prize of a lottery sponsored by the local shops. Momoko tries a bowl of Kiyo's cream stew.

episodes.name: Illness
episodes.overview: The geiko and maiko ladies kick off the new year at an annual ceremony. Sumire loses her appetite, but Kiyo cooks up an antidote.

episodes.name: Carnival
episodes.overview: 'Tis the season of the annual costume event, and Momoko takes charge. Sumire accompanies Momoko to a high-end client dinner.

episodes.name: Passage
episodes.overview: While Sumire continues to shine, Tsurukoma reconsiders her future. Kiyo prepares her most important meal yet.
